mapper.select: SELECT ownerId, ownerName, ownerPwd, ownerTel, ownerMail, hotelCreated, hotelModified, businessNum FROM hotelOwner
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelOwner(hotelId, ownerName, ownerPwd, ownerTel, ownerMail, created, modified, businessNum) VALUES(#{hotelId}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPwd}, #{ownerTel}, #{ownerMail}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{businessNum});
mapper.update: UPDATE hotelOwner SET(ownerName=#{ownerName}, ownerPwd=#{ownerPwd}, ownerTel=#{ownerTel}, ownerMail=#{ownerMail}, modified=SYSDATE)
